transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello haan ji sir bataiye.

Customer: Awaz nahi aa raha kya?

Executive: Aa rahi hai sir aa rahi hai aapki awaz aa rahi hai.

Customer: Haan. Ye puch raha hu account manager kaun hai hamara dekhna ek baar. 

Executive: Mai hu sir Nikki Sharma naam hai mera.

Customer: Accha accha.

Customer: Aapko bana diya kya naya account manager?

Executive: Haan ji haan ji mai hi hu. Bataiye.

Customer: Kab se kab se bana diya aapko?

Executive: Kya bol rahe ho sir? Thoda sa network nahi aa raha hoga sir network nahi hai shayad waha pe.

Customer: Are mai to network me hi hu aap nahi ho.

Executive: Accha thik hai abhi aa raha hai sir aapko awaz?

Customer: Mujhe to aa raha hai.

Executive: Thik hai bataiye.

Customer: Aapne sir 96 pe call kiya tha kya customer care pe?

Customer: Customer care pe hi chal raha hai mera haan.

Executive: Fir waha pe aapne call kiya tha na account manager to mai hu mera number to aapke paas tha hi.

Customer: Mere paas kaha se aa jata aapka number?

Executive: Waha pe jaha se aapne call kiya hai na abhi.

Customer: Haan. Account haan wahi wahi pe mera number show ho jata hai usse pehle aapne customer care pe call kiya hai shayad.

Customer: Abhi mera phone utar hi ja raha hai customer care pe hi.

Executive: Nahi nahi nahi abhi to mere paas call end hua hai aapka bataiye kya shikayat aa rahe the aap?

Customer: Are to aap call karo na mujhe direct. Tabhi to aapke paas se aayega tabhi to awaz aayega.

Executive: Aap call kar lijiye aap shayad mujhe call kar rahe the isliye baar baar aapka call busy aa raha tha.

Customer: Haan to call karo aap ek baar mera 96 pe call chal raha hai.

Executive: Nahi sir ruko mai call karti hu ek second ruko.

Customer: Kab karoge aaj ya kal?

Executive: Abhi kar rahi hu sir abhi call cut karungi na mai karti hu aapko call.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to know account manager details.

- Customer complained about call connectivity issues.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed being the account manager.

- Executive offered to call the customer back.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- account manager, connectivity, call issue
